item.title: Attention, memory and aphasia: Implications
item.description: Tags: #aphasia #language Code: O Type: Live online event (Past event) Website: Speech Pathology Australia — Learning Hub Description: Evidence from aphasia literature supports the proposition that cognitive processes, such as attention and memory, influence language production and comprehension.

item.title: Sounds Write
item.description: Tags: #literacy #language #dyslexia Code: O Type: Live online workshops (Feb 2023) Website: SPELD NSW Description: Sounds-Write is an evidence-based highly structured, synthetic, linguistic phonics program utilising an exciting and highly successful approach to the teaching of reading and spelling.

item.title: Talk for Writing
item.description: Tags: #language #literacy Code: O Type: Live online workshops (Mar 2023) Website: Dyslexia — SPELD Foundation Description: Talk for Writing is a unique process that uses spoken activities to develop writing skills.
